content: NEW YORK  Sept 27 Design-software company Autodesk Inc's shares could jump 50 percent in the next 18 months as investors get more comfortable with the company's transition to a cloud-based business model  according to a Sunday report in Barron's financial newspaper.

title: Autodesk's move to cloud could send up stock: Barron's
